original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra dh'a tu ma h'a mandalo pi ka sarba badzro d'a ya n'a ma /
analyzed: badzra dh'a tu ma h'a mandalo pi ka sarba badzro d'a ya n'a ma /
translated: Vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalopikā sarvavajrodaya nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rdo rje thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rdo rje thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The ritual of the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm, called “the origin of all vajras”

original: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' la //
analyzed: khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' la //
translated: To the all-pervading Vajrasattva,

original: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te //🔽rdo rje kun 'byung dge ba yi //
analyzed: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te // rdo rje kun 'byung dge ba yi //
translated: I pay homage with complete faith.🔽The virtuous ritual of the maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya //
translated: Of the origin of all vajras will be explained.

original: de la 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud chen po'i cho gas dam tshig la sogs pa thob /
analyzed: de la 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud chen po'i cho gas dam tshig la sogs pa thob /
translated: There, having obtained the commitments and so forth through the ritual of the great tantra of the Compendium of Principles,

original: rnal 'byor pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: For the sake of the yogī, the ritual of the maṇḍala should be condensed.

original: dang por re zhig bdag med pa la lhag par mos pas nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la /
analyzed: dang por re zhig bdag med pa la lhag par mos pas nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la /
translated: First, having faith in selflessness, one should bathe with an inner nature.

original: lkog ma'i phyogs su yi ge hr'i:las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams pa'i lce'i padma'i 'dab mar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la /
analyzed: lkog ma'i phyogs su yi ge hr'i:las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams pa'i lce'i padma'i 'dab mar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bskyed la /
translated: In the throat, from the syllable hrīḥ, imagine an eight-petaled lotus. On the tongue, on the lotus petals, generate a white five-pronged vajra from hūṃ.

original: badzra dzi hv'a zhes bya ba 'dis lce phyin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra dzi hv'a zhes bya ba 'dis lce phyin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: With vajra-tongue, bless the tongue.

original: lag pa gnyis su yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsams te /
analyzed: lag pa gnyis su yang aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsams te /
translated: In both hands, also, imagine a moon maṇḍala from aṃ.

original: @2a * // de gnyis kyi steng du h'um gnyis las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar por bsams shing /
analyzed: @2a * // de gnyis kyi steng du h'um gnyis las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar por bsams shing /
translated: On top of those two, imagine two white five-pronged vajras from two hūṃs.

original: lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyang rdo rje'i rtse mor bsams la /
analyzed: lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyang rdo rje'i rtse mor bsams la /
translated: Also, imagine the fingers of the hands as the tips of the vajras.

original: bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya'o //
translated: One should do the removal of obstacles, and so on.

original: de la yang yi ge h'um las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams la /
analyzed: de la yang yi ge h'um las rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bdag nyid bsams la /
translated: Also, imagine oneself as Vajra-jvalanā from the syllable hūṃ.

original: aom grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes brjod la /
analyzed: aom grihna badzra sa ma ya h'um bam zhes brjod la /
translated: Recite oṃ gṛhṇa vajra samaya hūṃ vaṃ.

original: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
translated: Bind the mudra of Krodha-caṇḍa.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcing nas //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcing nas //
translated: Having bound the vajra-palms together,

original: yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba'i //
analyzed: yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba'i //
translated: one should cover with the mind of wrath.

original: rdo rje mthe bong dam po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje mthe bong dam po ste //
translated: The vajra is the firm thumb.

original: khro bo ti r'inti rir bshad //
analyzed: khro bo ti r'inti rir bshad //
translated: This is explained as the wrathful Tīrntīri.

original: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung phyed du 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung phyed du 'dug la /
translated: Then, sitting in the half vajra posture,

original: rdo rje ti r'inti rir bcing ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ti r'inti rir bcing ste /
translated: bind with the vajra Tīrntīri.

original: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um /
translated: Om vajra jvala anala arka hum.

original: aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
analyzed: aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
translated: Abhisinca mam.

original: zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'i mthe bong gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng ba sor mo'i steng nas dgab pa'i tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'i mthe bong gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng ba sor mo'i steng nas dgab pa'i tshul du gzhag pa 'di ni ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: With that, the vajra fist is bound inside, the two thumbs are pressed together and raised, and the fingers are placed as if covering the top of the thumbs. This is the mudra of Tīrntīri.

original: 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams nas /
translated: Beginning from the crown,

original: phyogs ba zhir rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs la /
analyzed: phyogs ba zhir rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blangs la /
translated: one should take the empowerment of the vajra garland.

original: aom tum zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go bgos la /
analyzed: aom tum zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi go chas go bgos la /
translated: One should don the armor of the two syllables, om and tum.

original: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um /
translated: Recite om vajra jvala anala arka hum.

original: zhes brjod cing g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas /
analyzed: zhes brjod cing g-yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas /
translated: Placing the left fist at the heart,

original: g-yas pas rdo rje khu tshur gsor zhing /
analyzed: g-yas pas rdo rje khu tshur gsor zhing /
translated: one should brandish the vajra fist with the right.

original: bgegs thams cad la bsnun @2b par bya'o //
analyzed: bgegs thams cad la bsnun @2b par bya'o //
translated: One should strike all the obstructors.

original: de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs sreg pa la sogs pa bya sta /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas bgegs sreg pa la sogs pa bya sta /
translated: Then, together with the vajra-fire gesture, one should burn the obstructors and so forth.🔽One should recite:

original: aom badzra dzva la aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: aom badzra dzva la aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Oṃ vajra-flame Acala burn, burn, consume, destroy, Hūṃ phaṭ.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
translated: Having bound the vajra-bond inside,

original: sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas te /
analyzed: sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas te /
translated: one should make the fingers blaze inside.

original: mthe bong rdo rje sgreng ba 'di ni /
analyzed: mthe bong rdo rje sgreng ba 'di ni /
translated: The extended vajra of the thumbs is

original: rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: the vajra-fire gesture.

original: de'i rjes la badzra ni ti bandha sarba bighn'am zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o //🔽rdo rje bsdams pa bcing la mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste /🔽bsnyams la bzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la badzra ni ti bandha sarba bighn'am zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bcing bar bya'o // rdo rje bsdams pa bcing la mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste / bsnyams la bzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: After that, one should bind all obstructors with the gesture and the mantra of Vajra-noose.🔽Having bound the vajra-bond, one should extend the two thumbs🔽and place them together. This is the gesture of Vajra-Eye.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang las la bzhag ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang las la bzhag ste /
translated: Having extended the vajra-bond, one should place it on the eyes.

original: aom badzra dri dho me bha wa raksha sarb'am sv'a h'a zhes bya bas 'og bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra dri dho me bha wa raksha sarb'am sv'a h'a zhes bya bas 'og bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With Om vajra dridho me bhava rakṣa sarv[ā]m svahā, bind below.

original: rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya /
analyzed: rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan gyi phyag rgya /
translated: The mudra of Vajrabhairava's eye.

original: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat ces bya ba dang bcas pas steng bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat ces bya ba dang bcas pas steng bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With Om hulu hulu hum phat, bind above.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
translated: Form the two vajra fists,

original: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /
analyzed: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /
translated: and rotate them like a firebrand.

original: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed can gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed can gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Place the index fingers in the shape of hooks above the head. This is the mudra of Vajrabhairava.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya /
translated: The mudra of Vajrayaksa.

original: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas de'i 'og tu yang de nyid du steng bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas de'i 'og tu yang de nyid du steng bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With Om vajra yaksha hum, bind above there as well.

original: rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bong gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bong gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur byas pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Extend the two thumbs of the vajra palms and make the two index fingers like fangs. This is the mudra of Vajrayaksa.

original: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste /🔽aom drum bandha ham zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste / aom drum bandha ham zhes bya ba'am /
translated: One should bind the eastern direction with the mudra of Vajroṣṇīṣa.🔽The mantra is “oṃ druṃ bandha haṃ,”

original: drum zhes bya ba ni sngags so //
analyzed: drum zhes bya ba ni sngags so //
translated: or “druṃ” alone.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel la /
translated: One should interlace the two little fingers of the two vajra fists into a chain,

original: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mor sbyar te /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mor sbyar te /
translated: and join the tips of the two index fingers.

original: bzlog nas spyi bor gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: bzlog nas spyi bor gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Reversing it, one should place it on the crown of the head. This is the mudra of Vajroṣṇīṣa.

original: yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste /
translated: One should bind that with the vajra noose.🔽The mantra is “oṃ hūṃ vajrapāśa hriḥ.”

original: aom h'um badzra p'a sha hr'i:rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi ma khrig ma mdud par byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: aom h'um badzra p'a sha hr'i:rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi ma khrig ma mdud par byas pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra of the vajra noose is formed by interlacing the two vajra fists.

original: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
translated: One should bind the western direction with the vajra banner.

original: aom badzra pa tam ke pa tam ke ni ra ta /
analyzed: aom badzra pa tam ke pa tam ke ni ra ta /
translated: The mantra is “oṃ vajra-pattaṃ ka-pattaṃ nira-ta.”

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du byas pa la ;
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du byas pa la ;
translated: From the vajra binding, one should form the gesture of the two thumbs in the sattva posture,

original: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par gshibs te /
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par gshibs te /
translated: and the two index fingers should be even and straight.

original: phye la mthe'u chung gnyis ba ngan ltar bya ba ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phye la mthe'u chung gnyis ba ngan ltar bya ba ni rdo rje ba dan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The gesture of the vajra banner is made with the two little fingers like a hook.

original: phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi bgegs rnams tshar bcad par byas nas /
analyzed: phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi bgegs rnams tshar bcad par byas nas /
translated: Having destroyed the obstructors in the directions, intermediate directions, above, and below,

original: rdo rje dus kyi byang phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje dus kyi byang phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
translated: bind the north with the vajra time.

original: hri badzra k'a li rut mat /🔽rdo rje gnod sbyin @3a * //
analyzed: hri badzra k'a li rut mat / rdo rje gnod sbyin @3a * //
translated: Hrīḥ vajra kāli ruta mat.

original: gyi phyag rgya nyid khar brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje dus kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: gyi phyag rgya nyid khar brtan par byas pa ni rdo rje dus kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The gesture of vajra time is made with the vajra yakṣa gesture stabilized at the mouth.

original: rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
translated: Bind the south with the vajra peak.

original: aom badzra shi kha ra ru ta ma ta /
analyzed: aom badzra shi kha ra ru ta ma ta /
translated: Oṃ vajra śikhara ruta mat.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul du bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The gesture of the vajra peak is made with the two vajra fists in the manner of lifting a mountain.

original: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la ra ba bya'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcing bar byas la ra ba bya'o ;
translated: Having bound the vajra action maṇḍala, make the enclosure.

original: / h'um badzra karma /
analyzed: / h'um badzra karma /
translated: Hūṃ vajra karma.

original: yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis nang du ra ba byas ste /
analyzed: yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis nang du ra ba byas ste /
translated: Again, make the enclosure inside with the vajra hūṃ.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
translated: Make the two vajra fists.

original: mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te /
analyzed: mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te /
translated: Cross the two wrists.

original: mthe'u chung gnyis kyi lcags kyu sprel la /
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis kyi lcags kyu sprel la /
translated: The hook of the two little fingers is the monkey.

original: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu bsgreng ba ni rdo re h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub tu bsgreng ba ni rdo re h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The one called “Victorious over the Three Realms” is the mudra of Vajrahūṃkāra, with the two index fingers extended as threatening forefingers.

original: 'di nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: From this very mudra, the index finger and the middle finger are made into a vajra, which is the mudra of Vajrakarma.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa dang badzra bandha bam zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje'i dra ba bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa dang badzra bandha bam zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje'i dra ba bya'o //
translated: With the vajra bond and “vajra bandha vaṃ,” one should make a vajra net.

original: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / aom badzra tsakra h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du sprul par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / aom badzra tsakra h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du sprul par bya ste /
translated: Then, with the mudra of the vajra wheel and “oṃ vajra cakra hūṃ,” one should emanate in front of the great maṇḍala of the vajra realm.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
translated: Having formed the two vajra fists,

original: mdzub mo mthe'u chung rdo rje mdud //
analyzed: mdzub mo mthe'u chung rdo rje mdud //
translated: the index finger and the little finger are vajra-bound.

original: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags te //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes grags te //
translated: This is renowned as the vajra wheel,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin //
translated: which accomplishes all maṇḍalas.

original: 'dis phyogs thams cad du g-yas phyogs nas bskor bas /
analyzed: 'dis phyogs thams cad du g-yas phyogs nas bskor bas /
translated: Circumambulating all the directions clockwise with this,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul bar bya'o //
translated: one should emanate the entire maṇḍala.

original: 'di nyid khar gzhag la lta bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di nyid khar gzhag la lta bzhin du /
translated: Placing this [mudra] on one’s mouth and looking at it,

original: rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: one should recite the vajra wheel mantra one hundred and eight times. One will enter all maṇḍalas.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor blos mngon sum lta bur dmigs la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor blos mngon sum lta bur dmigs la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
translated: Then, visualizing the maṇḍala as if directly perceived by the mind, one should make offerings with flowers and so forth.

original: phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor lnga pa la 'dis phyag bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor lnga pa la 'dis phyag bya'o //
translated: One should make obeisance to the five maṇḍalas in all directions with this [verse]:

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro m'i /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra bandha nam ka ro m'i /
translated: oṃ all tathāgatas, I pay homage to the vajra pledge of body, speech, and mind.

original: de nas phyag bzhi bya ste /
analyzed: de nas phyag bzhi bya ste /
translated: Then, one should make four prostrations:

original: 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo brkyang la lus thams cad phab ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo brkyang la lus thams cad phab ste /
translated: Thus, in the east, one should extend the vajra palms, lower the entire body,🔽and recite this [verse]:

analyzed: yang thal mo khang stong du sbyar ba bcings nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: Again, form the hollow space of the palms and say this:🔽“Whatever wish-fulfilling trees or cloth trees there are

translated: in order to perform the activity of making offerings to all tathāgatas without exception.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rigs lnga dang bcas par bzhugs pa thams cad dang / snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang / rig sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad la dbul bar bgyi'o //

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra bo dhi aa lam ka ra bastra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsa tur ma h'a brahma bi h'a ra p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran par byas nas /

original: ma bskal ba rnams bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir dang / ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dang / dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang /

translated: For the sake of liberating those who are not liberated, for the sake of freeing those who are not free, for the sake of comforting those who are not comforted, for the sake of passing beyond sorrow those who have not passed beyond sorrow,

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra po dhi tsitta p'u da me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra po dhi tsitta p'u da me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

analyzed: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /

translated: May they be endowed with all virtuous physical, verbal, and mental actions.”🔽Oṃ sarva tathāgata mahā vajra udbhava śīla pāramitā pūja megha saṃudra spharaṇa samaye hūṃ

analyzed: 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa na snga ra aa pa ri tyam k'u nutta ra ma h'a b'irya p'a ra mi ta p'u dza ma gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
translated: oṃ sarva tathāgata sanna sara aparitaya kṣaṇottara mahā vīrya pāramitā pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye hūṃ

analyzed: ye h'um / me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /

translated: May they be perfect in the perfection of the wisdom of the highest meditation of all the Tathagatas, in the mastery of all the superknowledges and all reasoning.🔽Oṃ sarva tathāgata anuttara śoka kṣaya vihara dhyāna pāramitā pūja megha samudra spharaṇa samaye hūṃ.

original: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /

analyzed: gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang / de kho na nyid mthong ste nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nutta ra kle sha tstshe da sarba dharm'a: sa manta dzny'a na ma h'a pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra sapha
translated: Oṃ. All tathāgatas, please bestow the empowerment of the supreme gnosis of the great wisdom of the great perfection of wisdom, which is the offering of all phenomena.

original: ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: ra na sa ma ye h'um /

original: lus kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: lus kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka niry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
translated: Om sarva tathagata vak niryatana puja megha samudra spharana samaye hum.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyor bas /

analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la lhag par mos par byas la /
translated: imagine that you aspire to the equality of all phenomena.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

original: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos par byas la /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos par byas la /

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /

original: zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod par bya'o //

analyzed: bdag dus thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol /

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: One should dedicate that root of merit to all sentient beings.

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bde
translated: May we be happy and joyful, endowed with all the excellences of the world and beyond the world.🔽May we become buddhas, the highest of humans, in this very life.

original: ba nyid dang yid bde ba nyid kyis mi'i mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
analyzed: ba nyid dang yid bde ba nyid kyis mi'i mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
translated: By these virtuous actions of mine,

original: 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog //
analyzed: 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog //
translated: may I quickly become a buddha for the world.

original: 'grol phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
analyzed: 'grol phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
translated: Teaching the Dharma for the benefit of beings,

original: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las sgrol //
analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las sgrol //
translated: I will liberate them from the many sufferings of sentient beings.

analyzed: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la /
translated: Thus, dedicate your virtue to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Then, take the vows:

original: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams ;

analyzed: tishtha badzra zhes zlos zhing snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: and release it at the heart while reciting “Tiṣṭha vajra.”

original: de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
translated: Then, take water with a vajra-consecrated vase with a vajra fist,

original: badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba 'dis chus dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba 'dis chus dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
translated: and take the empowerment water with “Vajra-abhiṣiñca.”

original: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pas blang bar bya ste ;
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pas blang bar bya ste ;
translated: Then, the empowerment is conferred by the diadems of the five buddhas and the streamers of silk, which are taken up by Vajradhātvīśvarī, and so forth.

original: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba //🔽mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //🔽mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba // mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la // mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni //
translated: The vajra palms are joined,🔽the two thumbs crossed,🔽the tips of the index fingers bent,

original: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
analyzed: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
translated: and the middle fingers joined at the joints.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
translated: This is explained as the gesture of Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: ces bya ba 'di dang / aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzri n'i aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya bas spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di dang / aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzri n'i aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya bas spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: With this and “Oṃ vajra-dhātu-svabhāva-śuddhaḥ sarvadharma-dhātu-svabhāva-śuddho ’haṃ,” one should imagine that one is Vairocana on one’s crown, white in color, seated in the gesture of supreme enlightenment.

original: de nyid las dbu ma rdo rjer byas pa 'di dang / aom badzra badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
analyzed: de nyid las dbu ma rdo rjer byas pa 'di dang / aom badzra badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
translated: From that, the middle finger is made into a vajra, and with this and “Oṃ vajra-vajriṇi hūṃ,”

original: dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon pos gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bya'o //
analyzed: dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon pos gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bya'o //
translated: On the forehead, one should visualize Akṣobhya, blue in color, seated in the vajra posture.

original: @8b gung mo gnyis bkug ste rin po che 'dra bar byas pa 'di dang / aom ratna badzri ni h'um zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya can bsam mo //
analyzed: @8b gung mo gnyis bkug ste rin po che 'dra bar byas pa 'di dang / aom ratna badzri ni h'um zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya can bsam mo //
translated: With the two middle fingers bent and shaped like a jewel, and with the mantra “Oṃ ratna-vajri hūṃ,” one should visualize Ratnasaṃbhava, yellow in color, seated in the boon-granting mudrā, above the right ear.

original: gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung padma 'dra bar byas pa 'di dang / aom dharma badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
analyzed: gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung padma 'dra bar byas pa 'di dang / aom dharma badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
translated: With the middle, ring, and pinky fingers shaped like a lotus, and with the mantra “Oṃ dharma-vajri hūṃ,”

original: ltag par 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya can bsam mo //
analyzed: ltag par 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya can bsam mo //
translated: one should visualize Amitābha, red in color, seated in the supreme meditative absorption mudrā, at the nape of the neck.

original: sor mo brkyang ba 'di dang / aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya ba 'dis /
analyzed: sor mo brkyang ba 'di dang / aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya ba 'dis /
translated: With the fingers extended, and with the mantra “Oṃ karma-vajri hūṃ abhiṣiñcāmāṃ,”

original: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag /
analyzed: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag /
translated: one should visualize Amoghasiddhi, green in color, seated in the boon-granting mudrā, above the left ear.

original: rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that they all enter into the heart of Vajradhatviśvarī.

original: 'di thams cad kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di thams cad kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya las byung ba yin no //
translated: All of these arise from the seal of Vajradhātvīśvarī.

original: de'i rjes la aom tum zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa bcing pa'i tshul gyis go bgo bar bya zhing /
analyzed: de'i rjes la aom tum zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa bcing pa'i tshul gyis go bgo bar bya zhing /
translated: After that, with “oṃ tuṣṭim” and the two vajra fists, one should don the armor by way of binding a knot at the heart.

original: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang / ltag pa dang ; snying ga dang / nu ma'i par dang / yang snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / rgyab dang dpral ba'i steng du mdud la /
analyzed: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang / ltag pa dang ; snying ga dang / nu ma'i par dang / yang snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / rgyab dang dpral ba'i steng du mdud la /
translated: Likewise, at the throat, the back of the neck, the heart, the breasts, again at the heart, the throat, the back, and above the forehead, one should bind a knot.

original: dar dbyangs bcing ba'i tshul du byas te /
analyzed: dar dbyangs bcing ba'i tshul du byas te /
translated: One should make a ribbon by way of binding.

original: sgeg pa dang bcas pas tha ma la sogs pa nas bkrol te /
analyzed: sgeg pa dang bcas pas tha ma la sogs pa nas bkrol te /
translated: With a flirtatious gesture, one should untie the ribbon, beginning with the end.

original: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / badzra tu shya ho zhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o ;
analyzed: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / badzra tu shya ho zhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o ;
translated: In the end, with the añjali gesture and “vajra-tūṣya-hoḥ,” one should please her.

original: / de nas /🔽sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
analyzed: / de nas / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
translated: Then,🔽“Today I consecrate the vajra empowerment of the buddhas

original: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
analyzed: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
translated: for you.

original: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
translated: In order to fully accomplish all the buddhas,

original: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
analyzed: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
translated: you should take up this vajra.🔽With this, “Oṃ, you are consecrated with the vajra of the lord.

original: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya satvam zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya satvam zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
translated: You should take up the consecration of your vajra with this.

original: rang gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ni sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mo lnga pa gser la sogs pa las byas pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ni sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mo lnga pa gser la sogs pa las byas pa'o //
translated: “Your vajra” is the vajra of the tathāgatas, twelve fingerbreadths in length, with five points, made of gold, and so on.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rdo rje ni tshad nges pa med de /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rdo rje ni tshad nges pa med de /
translated: The vajra of Mahāvajradhara is without a fixed size.

original: rtse mo lnga pa cung zad gyes pa 'od zar dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rtse mo lnga pa cung zad gyes pa 'od zar dang bcas pa /
translated: It has five points, is slightly open, and has light rays.

original: cha gsum pa'i chang zung can /
analyzed: cha gsum pa'i chang zung can /
translated: It has three parts, and its handle is the size of a thumb.

original: padma r'a ga la sogs pa las bya'o //
analyzed: padma r'a ga la sogs pa las bya'o //
translated: It should be made of ruby, and so on.

original: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i yang de nyid yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i yang de nyid yin no //
translated: The vajra of Vajrarāja, and so on, is also that.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ni gnam lcags shin tu sbyangs pa las byas pa /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ni gnam lcags shin tu sbyangs pa las byas pa /
translated: The vajra of Vajrayakṣa and Vajrahūṃkāra is made of refined meteoric iron.

original: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshang la rtse mo lnga po rno ba /
analyzed: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshang la rtse mo lnga po rno ba /
translated: The vajra has twelve sides, and the five tips are sharp.

original: rdo rje de yang chang zung cha gsum pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje de yang chang zung cha gsum pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: That vajra also has three sections that are equal in size.

original: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang /🔽rdo rje @9a * //
analyzed: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang / rdo rje @9a * //
translated: The empowerment conferral of the name vajra🔽is as follows.

original: de rang gi mgo bor gzhag la /🔽aom badzra sa tva tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
analyzed: de rang gi mgo bor gzhag la / aom badzra sa tva tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
translated: Place that vajra on one’s head.🔽“Oṃ, Vajrasattva, I confer the empowerment on you.

original: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dis blang par bya ste /
analyzed: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dis blang par bya ste /
translated: This is the great vajra empowerment of so-and-so.

original: rang gi ming gang yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi ming gang yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Whatever one’s name is, one should add ‘heya’ to it.

original: de nas / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
analyzed: de nas / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
translated: Then, “This is the vajra of all buddhas,

original: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug //
translated: held in the hand of Vajrapāṇi.

original: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
analyzed: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
translated: You must always hold it

original: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
translated: and maintain the deliberate conduct of Vajrapāṇi.”

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha /
translated: “Oṃ, all tathāgatas, the vajra of the pledge of accomplishment, stand!

original: ae sha tvam /
analyzed: ae sha tvam /
translated: Esha tvaṃ!

original: dha ra y'a mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
analyzed: dha ra y'a mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
translated: Hold it! Vajrasattva! Hi hi hi hi hūṃ!”

original: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
translated: One should take up the vajra conduct.

original: de ltar bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Having thus performed the self-consecration and so forth, one should practice.

original: de la dang por re zhig rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
analyzed: de la dang por re zhig rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
translated: There, first of all, one should imagine that the moon maṇḍala in one's heart becomes one.

original: de nas rang gi lus la sa ma ya aa zhes zlos shing /
analyzed: de nas rang gi lus la sa ma ya aa zhes zlos shing /
translated: Then, reciting samaya stvaṃ in one's body,

original: lha thams cad kyi gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
translated: one should generate the moon maṇḍala in the abode of all deities.

original: rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: And on the moon maṇḍala situated in one's abode, one should form the great seal of Vajrasattva.

original: sngags de nyid kyis mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /🔽badzra satva aa zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje'i bdag nyid du dbab par byas nas /
analyzed: sngags de nyid kyis mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du / badzra satva aa zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje'i bdag nyid du dbab par byas nas /
translated: With that very mantra, in the space in front, on that moon maṇḍala,🔽with vajra-sattva aḥ, one should cause the descent of the nature of the vajra.

original: badzro& ham zhes bya ba 'dis de'i nga rgyal yang bsgoms la /
analyzed: badzro& ham zhes bya ba 'dis de'i nga rgyal yang bsgoms la /
translated: And with vajra-svabhāva ātmako 'haṃ, one should cultivate the pride of that.

original: badzra satv'a ham zhes bya bas de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar por bsam mo //
analyzed: badzra satv'a ham zhes bya bas de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar por bsam mo //
translated: With vajrasattva ham, one imagines that very one as white Vajrasattva.

original: de la de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas /
analyzed: de la de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas /
translated: There, with the vajra hook and so forth,

original: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
analyzed: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
translated: one should summon, induct, bind, and control.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / badzra satva dri shya zhes bya ba 'dis blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / badzra satva dri shya zhes bya ba 'dis blta bar bya'o //
translated: With the pledge seal of the Blessed One Vajrasattva and vajrasattva dṛśya, one should behold.

original: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas /🔽rang gi snying ga'i zla bar /
analyzed: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas / rang gi snying ga'i zla bar /
translated: Again, with that very pledge seal and saying jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ,

original: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang dbang du bya'o //
translated: one should summon, induct, bind, and control into the moon at one's heart.

original: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod pas /
translated: With the utterance of samaya stvaṃ,

original: rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni //
analyzed: rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni //
translated: having accomplished the moon behind,

original: sa ma ya satvam aa ham zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: sa ma ya satvam aa ham zhes brjod pas /
translated: with the utterance of samaya stvaṃ aham,

original: der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom /
analyzed: der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom /
translated: one should meditate on oneself as the body of the bodhisattva.

original: badzra satva zhes bya ba'i snying po dang / aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra satva zhes bya ba'i snying po dang / aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the essence mantra vajrasattva and also the mantra om vajrasattva hum.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Similarly, one should form the great mudras of Vajraraja and so forth,

original: de @9b phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis bdag nyid du snying po 'dis dbab par bya'o //🔽badzra r'a dza aa /
analyzed: de @9b phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis bdag nyid du snying po 'dis dbab par bya'o // badzra r'a dza aa /
translated: and with the form of those mudras, one should cause them to descend with this essence mantra.🔽Vajraraja am.

original: badzra r'a ga aa /🔽badzra s'a dhu aa /
analyzed: badzra r'a ga aa / badzra s'a dhu aa /
translated: Vajraraga am.🔽Vajrasadhu am.

original: badzra ratna aa /🔽badzra te dza aa /
analyzed: badzra ratna aa / badzra te dza aa /
translated: Vajraratna am.🔽Vajrateja am.

original: badzra ke tu aa /🔽badzra h'a sya aa /🔽badzra dharma aa /
analyzed: badzra ke tu aa / badzra h'a sya aa / badzra dharma aa /
translated: Vajraketu am.🔽Vajrahasya am.🔽Vajradharma am.

original: badzra t'ikshna aa /🔽badzra he tu aa /
analyzed: badzra t'ikshna aa / badzra he tu aa /

original: badzra bh'a sha aa /🔽badzra karma aa /
analyzed: badzra bh'a sha aa / badzra karma aa /
translated: Vajrabhasa am.🔽Vajrakarma am.

original: badzra raksha aa /🔽badzra yaksha aa ;
analyzed: badzra raksha aa / badzra yaksha aa ;
translated: Vajraraksa am.🔽Vajrayaksa am.

original: badzra sandhi aa /🔽badzra l'a sya aa /
analyzed: badzra sandhi aa / badzra l'a sya aa /
translated: Vajrasandhi am.🔽Vajralasya am.

original: badzra m'a le aa /🔽badzra g'i ti aa /
analyzed: badzra m'a le aa / badzra g'i ti aa /
translated: Vajramala am.🔽Vajragiti am.

original: badzra n'i rti aa /🔽badzra dh'u pa aa /
analyzed: badzra n'i rti aa / badzra dh'u pa aa /
translated: Vajranrta am.🔽Vajradhupa am.

original: badzra pusheb aa /🔽badzra a'a lo ke aa /
analyzed: badzra pusheb aa / badzra a'a lo ke aa /
translated: Vajrapuja am.🔽Vajraaloke am.

original: badzra gandhe aa /
analyzed: badzra gandhe aa /
translated: Vajragandhe am.

original: badzra aam ku sha aa /
analyzed: badzra aam ku sha aa /
translated: Vajra hook!

original: badzra p'a sha aa /🔽badzra spho ta aa /
analyzed: badzra p'a sha aa / badzra spho ta aa /
translated: Vajra noose!🔽Vajra chain!

original: badzra a'a be sha aa /
analyzed: badzra a'a be sha aa /
translated: Vajra invitation!

original: de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya ste /🔽aom ku sho ham /🔽sha ro ham /
analyzed: de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya ste / aom ku sho ham / sha ro ham /
translated: Then one should meditate on the pride of those mudras:🔽Om! I am the hook!

original: tushti ra ham /
analyzed: tushti ra ham /
translated: I am the noose!

original: ratna ma ham /🔽badzra s'u ryo ham /
analyzed: ratna ma ham / badzra s'u ryo ham /
translated: I am the chain!🔽I am the bell!

original: ke ru ra ham /🔽smi ta ma ham /🔽padmo ham / khad go ham /
analyzed: ke ru ra ham / smi ta ma ham / padmo ham / khad go ham /
translated: I am the vajra sun!🔽I am the vajra sapphire!

original: tsakra ma ham /🔽dzi hv'a ham /🔽karma badzro ham /
analyzed: tsakra ma ham / dzi hv'a ham / karma badzro ham /
translated: I am the vajra ruby!🔽I am the vajra lotus!

original: ba ra mo ham /🔽dam shto ham /🔽mu shti ra ham /
analyzed: ba ra mo ham / dam shto ham / mu shti ra ham /
translated: I am the vajra wheel!🔽I am the vajra sword!

original: badzra dva ya ma ham /🔽ratna m'a la ham /🔽ba'i na ham /

original: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
translated: one should make offerings to oneself and others.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni /🔽bcom ldan 'das @14a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni / bcom ldan 'das @14a * //
translated: The application of the pledge of the unsurpassed, supreme secret of all tathāgatas, the Great Vehicle,

original: kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: kyi dam tshig go //
translated: is the pledge of the Blessed One.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
translated: Thus, all tathāgatas

original: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
analyzed: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
translated: Since he does not transgress,

original: phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
translated: he is proclaimed the pledge of the seal.

original: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
analyzed: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
translated: The form of the mind is firm.

original: de nas dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: Then, ringing the bell, one should offer the song of the three pledges.

original: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
analyzed: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
translated: Om. Since you are endowed with the sign arisen from space,

original: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog //
translated: you are the supreme one without beginning or end.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
translated: You are the nature of the great being vajra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
translated: Vajrasattva, accomplish me today.

original: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
analyzed: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
translated: You are the supreme of all, the great attainment,

original: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
analyzed: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
translated: the supreme god of gods,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
translated: the vajra holder, the king of all,

original: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
analyzed: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
translated: the unchanging supreme one, accomplish me.

original: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
analyzed: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
translated: You are the constant one without fault,

original: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
analyzed: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
translated: you are the one who delights in all passion,

original: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
translated: you are the great passion, the great joy,

original: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
analyzed: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
translated: bhagavat, accomplish me with that.

original: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog //
analyzed: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog //
translated: You are the supreme of all purities,

original: gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
translated: you are the tathagata liberated from the beginning.

original: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
analyzed: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
translated: I am the nature of Samantabhadra,🔽the nature of all the Bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //🔽dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgya mchog gis //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod // dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgya mchog gis //
translated: I am the nature of all the Buddhas,🔽the nature of all the Vajrasattvas.🔽I am the nature of all the great accomplishments,

original: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod la /
analyzed: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod la /
translated: the nature of all the great lords.🔽I am the nature of all the great heroes,

original: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig //
analyzed: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig //
translated: the nature of all the Vajras.

original: de ltar bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: Having thus perfected oneself,

original: phyag rgya chen pos nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas la /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen pos nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas la /
translated: one should stand in the direction of space with the great seal,🔽and recite:

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
translated: Oṃ, the door of the syllable of all dharmas,🔽the door of the non-arising of all dharmas.

original: a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces brjod la de'i don la lhag par mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces brjod la de'i don la lhag par mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the entire world realm as emptiness by intensely contemplating its meaning.

original: de nas yi ge h'um las byung pa'i rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge h'um las byung pa'i rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, beginning from the vajra wind maṇḍala arisen from the syllable hūṃ,

original: rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du bsams la /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du bsams la /
translated: one should imagine up to the great ocean.

original: de'i dbus su h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: de'i dbus su h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las /
translated: In its center, from hūṃ suṃ hūṃ,

original: ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can zur bzhi pa /
analyzed: ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can zur bzhi pa /
translated: One should generate the king of mountains, Mount Meru, which is square, made of the natures of the four precious substances,

original: rin po che thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bskyed la /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bskyed la /
translated: and is adorned with all jewels.

original: aom badzra dri dho zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / rdo rje bsdams pas snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra dri dho zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / rdo rje bsdams pas snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: With the vajra-binding mudra, one should bless it as before with the mantra “Oṃ vajra-firm” and so forth.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas khang pa brtsegs pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas khang pa brtsegs pa /
translated: Above that, with the action mudra of the vajra-producing [samaya-jñāna-mudra], one should emanate a palace

original: rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa sprul la /
analyzed: rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa sprul la /
translated: with a peak made of vajra and jewel jewels.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sim aa zhes bya bas seng ge'i gdan /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sim aa zhes bya bas seng ge'i gdan /
translated: In the place of Vairocana, with “a siṃ a,” one should emanate a lion throne.

original: @14b mi bskyod pa'i gnas su h'um gam h'um zhes bya bas glang po che'i gdan /
analyzed: @14b mi bskyod pa'i gnas su h'um gam h'um zhes bya bas glang po che'i gdan /
translated: In the place of Akṣobhya, with “huṃ gaṃ huṃ,” one should emanate an elephant throne.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su tra p'a tra zhes bya bas rta'i gdan /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su tra p'a tra zhes bya bas rta'i gdan /
translated: In the place of Ratnasaṃbhava, with “tra pā tra,” one should emanate a horse throne.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su /
translated: In the place of Amitābha,

original: hr'i: mam hr'i:zhes bya bas rma bya'i gdan /
analyzed: hr'i: mam hr'i:zhes bya bas rma bya'i gdan /
translated: with “hrīḥ maṃ hrīḥ,” one should emanate a peacock throne.

original: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su /
analyzed: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su /
translated: In the place of Amoghasiddhi,🔽with “khaṃ khaṃ khaṃ,” one should emanate a garuḍa throne.

original: aa gam aa zhes bya ba las nam mkha' lding gi gdan bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: aa gam aa zhes bya ba las nam mkha' lding gi gdan bsam par bya'o //
translated: From the syllable a, one should imagine the seat of Garuḍa.

original: seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa la yang yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
analyzed: seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa la yang yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
translated: On the lion seat and so forth, one should generate the moon disk from the syllable a.

original: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
analyzed: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
translated: In the center, one should imagine oneself in the cross-legged bodhisattva posture.

original: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byas pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byas pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis /
translated: With a mental body that has actualized the meditative absorptions of the dhyānas and formless states,

original: 'og min du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bsams la /
analyzed: 'og min du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bsams la /
translated: in Akaniṣṭha, one should generate oneself in the form of the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvārthasiddha, who will emerge after three incalculable aeons.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that this buddha realm is completely filled with tathāgatas like sesame seeds in a pod.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang chos nyid dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang chos nyid dran par bya'o //
translated: Then one should recall the form bodies and dharmatā of all the tathāgatas.

original: de nas theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i chos so //
analyzed: de nas theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i chos so //
translated: Then, the Dharma of the Mahāyāna that is the means of deliverance.

original: de'i rjes la theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should recollect the Mahāyāna Saṅgha of bodhisattvas.

original: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad la lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba thams cad la snying rje ba dang /
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad la lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba thams cad la snying rje ba dang /
translated: Then, one should generate superior love for all sentient beings and all beings included in all world systems, and compassion for all those tormented by the sufferings of the lower realms and so on.

original: 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la btang snyoms su bya ba dang / chos thams cad la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / mig yor dang mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par mos par byas la ;
analyzed: 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la btang snyoms su bya ba dang / chos thams cad la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / mig yor dang mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par mos par byas la ;
translated: One should generate joy for all āryas, and equanimity toward all worldly phenomena, and one should have superior devotion to all phenomena as having the nature of non-entityness, as being like illusions, and as being like optical illusions.

original: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / rigs lnga dang rdo rje dril bu dang / phyag rgya dang slob dpon nyid dang / byams pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / rigs lnga dang rdo rje dril bu dang / phyag rgya dang slob dpon nyid dang / byams pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang /
translated: the generation of the mind of enlightenment, the perfection of wisdom, the conduct of skill in means, the five families, the vajra and bell, the mudrā consort, the state of a master, love, fearlessness,

original: zang zing dang / chos kyi sbyin @15a * //
analyzed: zang zing dang / chos kyi sbyin @15a * //
translated: the giving of material things,🔽the giving of the Dharma, the teaching of all the ways of mantra, the definite deliverance by means of the three vehicles, and the conduct of the door of mantra.

original: pa dang ; sngags kyi tshul thams cad ston pa dang / theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba dang / gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams mngon du byas la /🔽sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: pa dang ; sngags kyi tshul thams cad ston pa dang / theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba dang / gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams mngon du byas la / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: Having actualized all of these,

original: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bsams nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bsams nas /
translated: one should think, “I will become a buddha in order to accomplish the benefit and happiness of all sentient beings.”

original: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should enter into the meditative concentration of immovability.

original: de nas rim pa 'dis mngon par byang chub pa sngon du bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rim pa 'dis mngon par byang chub pa sngon du bya'o //
translated: Then, one should perform the manifest enlightenment by this process.

original: de ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is it:

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la //
translated: One should sit in the vajra posture.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkang te bzhag la /
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkang te bzhag la /
translated: On top of that, fill up with the vajra binding and place it.

original: rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam par bsams nas /
translated: Having imagined the sattva-vajra in one's heart,

original: 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste /
translated: one should meditate in this way.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to //
translated: Then all the tathāgatas filled this buddha-realm, for example, like a filled sesame pod.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te /
translated: Then all the tathāgatas gathered together

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba /
translated: and went to where the bodhisattva mahāsattva named Sarvārthasiddha,

original: byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa gang na bder gshegs te /
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa gang na bder gshegs te /
translated: who was sitting at the seat of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas /
translated: Having revealed the saṃbhogakāya to that bodhisattva,

original: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: they spoke thus:

original: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par /
translated: Son of noble family, for the sake of which you have not realized the thatness of all tathāgatas,

original: dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya snyam /
analyzed: dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya snyam /
translated: He should generate enthusiasm for all difficult practices and think, How can I fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete enlightenment?

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarvārthasiddha, urged by all the tathāgatas,

original: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
analyzed: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
translated: arose from the immovable samādhi,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas /
translated: bowed to all the tathāgatas,

original: 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and made this request:

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
translated: Bhagavāns, what is the suchness of the tathāgatas?

original: ji ltar na bsgrub par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar na bsgrub par bgyi /
translated: How should it be accomplished?

original: bka' stsal du gsol /
analyzed: bka' stsal du gsol /
translated: Please teach.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: When this was said, all those tathāgatas spoke with one voice:

original: rigs @15b kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dga' bar zlos shing 'grub par gyis shig / aom ci tta pra ti bya dham ka ro mi /
analyzed: rigs @15b kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dga' bar zlos shing 'grub par gyis shig / aom ci tta pra ti bya dham ka ro mi /
translated: Oṃ citta-pratītyasamutpāda-karohi.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then that bodhisattva said this to all the tathāgatas:

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so //
translated: “Bhagavān tathāgatas, I understand that the tathāgatas appear like a moon mandala in my heart.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The tathāgatas said:

original: rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na ;
analyzed: rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na ;
translated: “Son of good family, that mind is naturally luminous,

original: de ni ji lta bu sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni ji lta bu sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te /
translated: and it becomes just like whatever it is purified to be.

original: dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like a white cloth being dyed.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Then, in order to expand the knowledge of the naturally luminous mind of all the tathāgatas,

original: aom bo dhi tsitto tpa d'a y'a mi zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
analyzed: aom bo dhi tsitto tpa d'a y'a mi zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
translated: with the mantra “Oṃ bodhicittot pāda yāmi,” the mantra of natural accomplishment, the bodhisattva generated the mind of enlightenment.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas /

original: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
analyzed: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
translated: Today is the most holy day;

original: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
analyzed: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //

original: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //

original: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
analyzed: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //

original: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te /
analyzed: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te /

original: spos snod lag tu thogs te /
analyzed: spos snod lag tu thogs te /
translated: holding a vessel of incense in the hand,

analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o // ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
translated: one should invite all buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
translated: “All buddhas dwelling in all directions,🔽please consider me.

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
translated: I, named so-and-so,

original: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
translated: will draw the maṇḍala of the vajra holder.

original: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
analyzed: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
translated: Today all buddhas have come here.

original: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //🔽zhes brjod la /
analyzed: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol // zhes brjod la /

original: dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal po'i mchog rnam par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal po'i mchog rnam par bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on the supreme victor of the maṇḍala and the supreme victor of the activity,

original: yang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: yang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: again, having opened the door,

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa'i bar du byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa'i bar du byas nas /
translated: up to the abode of Vajrasattva, one should abide in the great mudra of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: de'i sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
analyzed: de'i sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
translated: The practitioner who is diligent in the recitation of his mantra

analyzed: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir /
translated: should be requested by the supreme friend in the practice, endowed with the pride of the tathāgatas, to draw the maṇḍala.

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: One should request with the one hundred and eight names.
