analyzed: de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas la /
translated: Then, having arisen, one should pay homage at the feet of all tathāgatas.🔽Having visualized all tathāgatas filling the realm of space,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams gang par mngon sum du bsams la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams gang par mngon sum du bsams la /
translated: one should recite:

original: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
analyzed: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
translated: I am the very one with the vajra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
translated: I am Vajrasattva himself.

original: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
analyzed: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
translated: I am the great king of buddhas.

original: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
analyzed: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
translated: I am the one with great strength and a vajra.

original: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
analyzed: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
translated: I am the lord of yogins, the victor.

original: phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin //
translated: I am Vajrapāṇi, the firm one.

original: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag /
analyzed: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag /
translated: I am the lord, the great vajra.

original: @24b byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
analyzed: @24b byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
translated: I will not abandon the consecration.

original: de nas badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
analyzed: de nas badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
translated: Then, having arranged vajra-sight in the two eyes,

original: yi ge aa las rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
analyzed: yi ge aa las rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
translated: one should generate a variegated vajra on the two soles of the feet from the syllable a.

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Having formed one’s pledge seal,

original: badzra satva auttishth'a zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i steng du bteg go//
analyzed: badzra satva auttishth'a zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i steng du bteg go//
translated: with vajra-sattva uttistha one should raise that maṇḍala into the sky.

original: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya des bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya des bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Then, having consecrated oneself with that very pledge seal,

original: yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: one should again form the great seal.

original: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
analyzed: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
translated: Standing in the seal, one should rise up

original: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
analyzed: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
translated: and look all around.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas //
translated: Having said “Vajrasattva,”

original: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
translated: one should circle with a majestic manner.🔽With the vajra gaze, one should bind the directions and subdirections,

original: rdo rje'i lta bas phyogs dang mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / rab dang dra ba byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje'i lta bas phyogs dang mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / rab dang dra ba byas nas /
translated: and having made the maṇḍala pure and the net,

original: rkang mthil nas yongs su gzung ste /
analyzed: rkang mthil nas yongs su gzung ste /
translated: one should hold it from the soles of the feet

original: sa gzhi nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du /
analyzed: sa gzhi nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du /
translated: up to the peak of Mount Meru.

original: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la //
translated: Having made it the nature of vajra,

original: yang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas /
analyzed: yang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas /
translated: one should again destroy the obstructors, and so on.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas /
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas /
translated: Endowed with this mantra and mudra,

original: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
translated: one should summon the secret maṇḍala.🔽Oṃ vajra sarva maṇḍala hūṃ jaḥ

original: aom badzra sarba mandala h'um dza: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo dang / mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni //
analyzed: aom badzra sarba mandala h'um dza: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo dang / mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni //
translated: The two vajra fists with the index and thumbs vajra-joined

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa yin no //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa yin no //
translated: is the summoning of all maṇḍalas.

original: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / ma h'a badzra tsakra aa dhi tishtha siddhya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / ma h'a badzra tsakra aa dhi tishtha siddhya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: And with the gesture of the vajra wheel, and with the mantra “Mahāvajra cakra adhiṣṭhāya siddhyahūṃ,” he should consecrate the maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no //
translated: The gesture of the vajra-causal-action is his gesture.

original: de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i rdo rje'i phur bu /
analyzed: de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i rdo rje'i phur bu /
translated: Then, with a vajra stake made of acacia wood,

original: dbus dang grva bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ste /
analyzed: dbus dang grva bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ste /
translated: he should strike the center and the four corners with the vajra.

original: aom badzra ki la ya sarba bighnam bandha h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
analyzed: aom badzra ki la ya sarba bighnam bandha h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
translated: With the essence mantra “Oṃ vajra-kīlaya sarva-vighnān baṃda hūṃ,” he should recite it one hundred and eight times.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste /
translated: Holding it with his left vajra fist,

original: rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la /
translated: he should take up the five-pronged vajra.

original: h'um zlos shing de dang dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhi dang dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur bu lnga bskyed la /
analyzed: h'um zlos shing de dang dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhi dang dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur bu lnga bskyed la /
translated: Reciting “hūṃ,” he should generate the five stakes in the four corners of the maṇḍala and in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje rtsa gsum par byas pas brdung zhing 'di skad ces bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje rtsa gsum par byas pas brdung zhing 'di skad ces bzlas par bya'o //
translated: With his right hand, he should make the three-pronged vajra and strike with it, reciting this:

original: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'an phat /
analyzed: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'an phat /
translated: Oṃ gha gha ghatāya ghatāya sarva duṣṭān phaṭ

original: ki la ya ki la ya sarba p'a pam phat: badzra ki la ya /
analyzed: ki la ya ki la ya sarba p'a pam phat: badzra ki la ya /
translated: kilaya kilaya sarva pāpaṃ phaṭ vajra kilaya

original: badzra dha rdo a'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
analyzed: badzra dha rdo a'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
translated: vajra dhara āyapatisva ha.

original: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bsang chu'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bsang chu'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la /
translated: Then, placing the vase of perfumed water, completely enchanted with the Vajrayakṣa, at the door of the maṇḍala,

original: @25a * // rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad brtan par byas la /
analyzed: @25a * // rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad brtan par byas la /
translated: one should make all the protections firm with the karma-mudra of the vajra fist.

original: rdo rje go chas go bskon par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje go chas go bskon par bya ste /
translated: One should don the vajra armor.

original: de yang bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor pa la //
analyzed: de yang bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor pa la //
translated: Moreover, it is stated:

original: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtan //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtan //
translated: “The vajra fist is very firm,

original: rdo rje go chas go bskon pas //🔽dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung bar bya //
analyzed: rdo rje go chas go bskon pas // dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung bar bya //
translated: and by donning the vajra armor,

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: one should protect the maṇḍala on all sides.”

original: yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /🔽dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag ste /
analyzed: yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la / dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag ste /
translated: Again, sitting in the center of the maṇḍala,🔽one should examine the maṇḍala.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas dris nye bar byugs la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas dris nye bar byugs la /
translated: Having sprinkled the site of the maṇḍala,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas su tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa'i lde gus dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas su tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa'i lde gus dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la /
translated: In the places of the five Tathagatas, make a square mandala with ointments of sandalwood, saffron, and so forth.

original: lhag ma rnams ni zlum por bya zhing rang rang gi sngags kyang lan bdun bdun du bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni zlum por bya zhing rang rang gi sngags kyang lan bdun bdun du bzla bar bya'o //
translated: The rest are made round, and one should recite each mantra seven times.

original: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang mnyes pa la sogs pa byas la rang gi snying gar bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang mnyes pa la sogs pa byas la rang gi snying gar bcug ste /
translated: Then, from the direction of space, one should summon the Tathagatas and so forth, and having caused them to enter, bind them, delight them, and so forth, one should place them in one's heart.

original: mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod do //
analyzed: mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod do //
translated: One should make offerings with the five offerings.

original: de nas dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan par chu nyung zad cig blugs la /
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan par chu nyung zad cig blugs la /
translated: Then, one should fill the vase for conferring empowerment with all the grains and so forth, and pour in a little water.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul te /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul te /
translated: Having offered a libation with the mantra of Vajrasattva and so forth,

original: spos chu dang me tog kyang bcug la spos kyis bdugs te /
analyzed: spos chu dang me tog kyang bcug la spos kyis bdugs te /
translated: put in perfumed water and flowers, and fumigate with incense.

original: chog bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: chog bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should perform the special abidance according to the ritual.

original: nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzlas par bya zhing /
analyzed: nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzlas par bya zhing /
translated: On the second day, one should recite the mantra three times,

original: des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: and he should be consecrated.

original: yang dkyil 'khor du bzlas la /
analyzed: yang dkyil 'khor du bzlas la /
translated: Again, one should recite the mantra in the maṇḍala,

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i de'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i de'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la /
translated: and the great being should understand the characteristics explained below.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should place him in front of Vajrasattva.

original: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas spyan la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas spyan la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should offer oblations of ghee, etc., to Vajrayakṣa, Vajrasattva, and Buddhalocanā, each one.

original: lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
analyzed: lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
translated: This is the rite of the preparatory fire offering.

original: // / de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
analyzed: // / de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
translated: Then, having given the bali outside,

original: nye reg byas nas /
analyzed: nye reg byas nas /
translated: and having performed the near-purity,

original: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
analyzed: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
translated: one should praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod la /
analyzed: me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod la /
translated: Having made offerings to the Tathāgata with flowers, etc., and with the goddesses such as Lāsya,

original: phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o //
translated: having prostrated, one should prepare the disciple for the preparatory stage.

original: de la re zhig dang por khrus legs par bya'o //
analyzed: de la re zhig dang por khrus legs par bya'o //
translated: There, first one should perform the ablution well.

original: gos gtsang ma bgo zhing /
analyzed: gos gtsang ma bgo zhing /
translated: Put on clean clothes.

original: @25b lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la /
analyzed: @25b lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la /
translated: The disciple holding flowers in his hand should bow to the master.

original: 'di skad smrar gzhug go //
analyzed: 'di skad smrar gzhug go //
translated: He should be made to say this:

original: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
analyzed: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
translated: “Great joy, you are my teacher;

original: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
translated: you, master, please consider me.🔽I seek the great protector,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //🔽mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa // mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
translated: who shows the way of the bodhisattva.

original: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
analyzed: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
translated: Please grant me the reality of the commitments;

original: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //🔽sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
translated: please grant me the thought of awakening.

original: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //🔽thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
analyzed: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol // thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
translated: Please grant me the three refuges:🔽the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha.🔽Protector, I wish to enter

original: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal //
analyzed: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal //
translated: the supreme city of great freedom.”

original: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
analyzed: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
translated: Then one should have him perform the confession of sins and so forth.

original: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
analyzed: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
translated: Having well collected your thoughts,

original: shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon //🔽brjod ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
analyzed: shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon // brjod ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
translated: listen with a very good motivation.

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
translated: The sugatas will not bless🔽the mind of one who is talkative.

original: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //🔽de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
analyzed: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang // de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
translated: Or rejoiced in, or caused others to do,🔽I confess each and every one of them

original: spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags //
analyzed: spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags //
translated: In the presence of the supreme enlightenment.🔽The two accumulations of the Bodhisattvas, the Sugatas’ heirs, are profound

original: bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang // rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
analyzed: bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang // rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
translated: And vast, and bring about the benefit of all beings without exception.

original: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la yang /🔽rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la yang / rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: In these, and in all other such activities,🔽I rejoice, now and forever.

original: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing //
analyzed: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing //
translated: May I be sustained by the compassion of those🔽Whose minds are free from evil and whose wisdom

original: blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
analyzed: blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //

analyzed: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang zhugs pa //

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //

original: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
analyzed: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
translated: The supreme delight of the wise,🔽The Jeta Grove, which brings joy to those

original: dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyal byed tshal //
analyzed: dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyal byed tshal //
translated: Who are afraid of the world,🔽And the supreme Dharma, the speech of the Sugatas,

original: srid pa'i 'byor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'byor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //

original: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //

original: blo gros rnams rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i //🔽brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing //
analyzed: blo gros rnams rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i // brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing //

original: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //

original: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
analyzed: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //

original: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa //

analyzed: snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs //
translated: With the root of compassion planted, one attains perfect realization.

original: mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi //
analyzed: mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi //
translated: One upholds the incomparable enlightenment.

original: sems can @26a * //🔽rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //
analyzed: sems can @26a * // rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //

original: yang na yongs su bskyab par bya phyir ram //
analyzed: yang na yongs su bskyab par bya phyir ram //
translated: or for the sake of fully protecting them,

original: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: or for the sake of purifying one's own mind,

original: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du btang //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du btang //
translated: one abandons all of this like grass and so forth.🔽Likewise, the unsurpassed discipline, patience, diligence,

analyzed: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni //
translated: concentration, and wisdom

original: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: are for the sake of purifying oneself and others.

original: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
analyzed: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //

original: bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis //
translated: The one who is skilled in the mantra of the Sugata,

original: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
analyzed: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
translated: The Dharma King, who is always spontaneously present,

original: 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to attain this state,

original: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
analyzed: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
translated: I will abide in the supreme state.

original: zhes lan gsum brjod do //
analyzed: zhes lan gsum brjod do //
translated: Recite this three times.

original: bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
analyzed: bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
translated: By the root of virtue of my reciting this,

original: bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will give away all that I have.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o ;
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o ;
translated: I will arouse the thought of sameness toward all sentient beings.

original: / bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas /
analyzed: / bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas /
translated: Having trained all sentient beings in all vehicles and all specific methods,

analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bgyi'o //
translated: I will establish them in the realm of non-abiding nirvana.

original: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang /
analyzed: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang /
translated: Even if all sentient beings were to attain complete nirvana,

analyzed: sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //

original: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
translated: I will realize that all phenomena are non-arising.

analyzed: bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: With a mind that is undistracted and with a mind of omniscient wisdom, I will train in the six perfections.

original: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o //
translated: I will realize the way of the single vehicle.

original: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: I will train in order to realize the thirty-seven factors of awakening.

original: bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
translated: I will strive to realize the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i @26b bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i @26b bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
translated: In the same way, I will accomplish all the limitless qualities of the Buddha, up to the very end.

original: 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed par rdo rje lta bu yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed par rdo rje lta bu yin te /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
translated: It is the father of all the tathāgatas, the doer of the bidding of all the tathāgatas, the eldest son of all the tathāgatas. This is the Blessed One Samantabhadra.

original: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par gyur pa rdzogs
analyzed: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par gyur pa rdzogs
translated: By the power of my roots of virtue, I will perfect this generation of the mind, and will abide in the conduct called Samantabhadra, which is the infinite abiding in infinite doors.

original: par byas nas /
analyzed: par byas nas /
translated: Having perfected it,

original: gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o //

translated: I will delight, I will gladden, I will inspire with confidence all the hosts of disciples without exception by teaching them the many doors of the divisions of conduct.

analyzed: de nas sa ma ya aa zhes bzlas pas slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
translated: Then, by reciting “samaya,” generate a moon maṇḍala in the heart of the disciple.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de bzhag la /🔽su ra ta sa ma ya stvam aa ho //
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de bzhag la / su ra ta sa ma ya stvam aa ho //
translated: Place the five-tined vajra on top of that.

original: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba'i snying po yang snying gar bzlas la /
analyzed: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba'i snying po yang snying gar bzlas la /
translated: Recite the essence mantra, “Surata samayas tvam, hoḥ / Vajra siddhya ya thā sukhaṃ,” at the heart.

original: spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste /
analyzed: spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste /

original: rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing /
translated: Recite Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: dpral bar yi ge tram las rin po che / lkog mar yi ge hram las padma /
translated: At the forehead, imagine a jewel from the syllable tram.🔽At the throat, imagine a lotus from the syllable hrīm.

original: spyi bor kam las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: spyi bor kam las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
translated: At the crown, imagine a crossed vajra from the syllable kham.

original: badzra satva badzra ratna /
analyzed: badzra satva badzra ratna /
translated: vajra sattva, vajra ratna,

original: badzra dharma / badzra karma zhes zlos shing /
analyzed: badzra dharma / badzra karma zhes zlos shing /

original: rang gi snying ga la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //

analyzed: de nas rdo rje dris de rnams kyi lag par dri sbyin par bya ste /
translated: Then one should give them scent in their hands with the vajra scent.

original: me tog gis me tog go //
analyzed: me tog gis me tog go //
translated: With flowers, flowers.

original: bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo //
analyzed: bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo //
translated: With incense, incense.

original: mar mes mar me'i snang ba bya'o //
analyzed: mar mes mar me'i snang ba bya'o //
translated: With lamps, the light of lamps.

original: de nas au dumw'a ra dang aa shvadtha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me tog bcings pa /
analyzed: de nas au dumw'a ra dang aa shvadtha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me tog bcings pa /
translated: Then one should give them tooth sticks of udumbara, asvattha, etc., twelve fingerbreadths long, with a flower tied to the tip,

original: rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin par bya'o //
translated: reciting the vajra smile.

analyzed: des kyang shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o //
translated: They should chew it, facing east or north, from the tip itself.

analyzed: de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas pa byin nas / @27a * // 'dis ni gdan du gding zhing /
translated: Then, having given them fresh kuśa grass, consecrated with Vajra-tikshna and Vajrasattva,

analyzed: 'dis ni sngags su gyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o //
translated: one should order them, Spread this out as a seat and sleep on it, having made it into a mantra.

original: de nas dpung pa g-yon par ni //
analyzed: de nas dpung pa g-yon par ni //
translated: Then, on the left shoulder,

original: rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa yi //
analyzed: rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa yi //
translated: with the mantra of Vajravarma,🔽one should tie on oneself

analyzed: srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i // bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing //
translated: the protection cord with three knots.

original: de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ci nus par bstan pas /
analyzed: de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ci nus par bstan pas /
translated: Then, by teaching the profound and vast Dharma to the best of one's ability,

original: thams cad la gzengs bstod pa byas nas /
analyzed: thams cad la gzengs bstod pa byas nas /
translated: all are encouraged.

original: bzhin bzangs dag longs shig / nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
analyzed: bzhin bzangs dag longs shig / nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /

analyzed: // / de nas nyi ma shar kar dkyil 'khor de de bzhin du steng du nam mkha' la bzhag la thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Then, at sunrise, that maṇḍala should be placed in the sky above, just as before, and the lines should be drawn.

original: de la dang por re zhig chon rtsi sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor bsgyur la /
analyzed: de la dang por re zhig chon rtsi sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor bsgyur la /
translated: There, first of all, one should dye the threads separately with fragrant blue, yellow, red, green, and white colors.

analyzed: go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas /
translated: Having arranged them in this order,

analyzed: de la h'um dr'am hr'i: aa aom zhes bya bas rang rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
translated: With hum dhra, hrīḥ, a, and aṃ, one should arrange Akṣobhya and so forth on the thread from their respective seeds.

analyzed: d'i pta drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la //
translated: With dīpta-dṛṣṭi-aṅkuśa jaḥ, one should arrange [the seeds] in the two eyes.

original: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig //
analyzed: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig //
translated: The eyes are very much trembling and blazing.

original: mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
analyzed: mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
translated: The eyes are drawn with the eyebrows.

original: zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas /
translated: With the blazing gaze,

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la bskul zhing /🔽bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la bskul zhing / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: one should incite Akṣobhya and so forth.

original: rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig / ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o //🔽de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btab pa'i srad bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig / ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o // de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btab pa'i srad bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste /
translated: One should also incite the Bhagavān to lay out the lines of the great maṇḍala with Please grant me the vajra lines.

original: rang gi lag na gnas pa la //
analyzed: rang gi lag na gnas pa la //
translated: Then, with the blazing hook of the thread, one should summon Akṣobhya and so forth, who are incited by the light of one's own seed, and having made the thread that is cast by them fill one's hand,

original: srad bu des gang bar byas la /
analyzed: srad bu des gang bar byas la /
translated: one should imagine that the thread is filled with them.

original: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: spa ra spa ra aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a: aa tyan ta /
analyzed: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: spa ra spa ra aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a: aa tyan ta /
translated: anyonyānuga-ta sarva-dharmāḥ, sparśa-sparśānu-praviṣṭa sarva-dharmāḥ, atyanta-

original: aa nu pra bishta /
analyzed: aa nu pra bishta /
translated: anupaviṣṭa sarva-dharmāḥ, oṃ vajra-sattva-haṃ.

original: sarba dharm'a: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shir bsgril bar bya'o //
analyzed: sarba dharm'a: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shir bsgril bar bya'o //
translated: Reciting this, one should twist the thread.

analyzed: bsgril nas mig g-yas dang g-yon gnyis su ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
translated: Having twisted it, one should generate the sun and moon from ma and ta in the right and left eyes,

original: badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas la /
analyzed: badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas la /
translated: and with vajra-dṛṣṭi māta one should stabilize them.

original: srad bu de dris byugs ba'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la /
analyzed: srad bu de dris byugs ba'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la /
translated: That thread should be placed in a vessel of gold, etc., anointed with scent,

original: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la /
analyzed: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la /
translated: and one should worship it with scent, flowers, incense, and so forth.

original: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a @27b ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste /

analyzed: badzra ham bandha zhes yid la brjod la /
translated: one should mentally recite vajra ham bandha.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dri'i thig le bdun byas te /
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dri'i thig le bdun byas te /
translated: Having made seven fragrant drops outside the outer enclosure of the mandala in the wind direction,🔽one should imagine that the whole realm of space is filled with Acalas.

original: thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas la /
analyzed: thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas la /
translated: Each drop is also made to contain a drop.

original: dbus ma dang tha ma yang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te /
analyzed: dbus ma dang tha ma yang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te /
translated: The middle and last [drops] are also endowed with seven drops.

original: thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ri dags la zhon pa mdog nag po /
analyzed: thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ri dags la zhon pa mdog nag po /
translated: Those seven drops are the seven wind gods, black in color, mounted on deer.

original: 'phags pa mi g-yo bas zhags pas bkug nas bcings par gyur par bsams la /
analyzed: 'phags pa mi g-yo bas zhags pas bkug nas bcings par gyur par bsams la /
translated: They are bound by being drawn in with a noose by Ārya Acalanātha.

original: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la /
translated: One of those is the principal one.

original: lhag ma thig le drug po ni de bskor te kun nas gnas par bsam mo //
analyzed: lhag ma thig le drug po ni de bskor te kun nas gnas par bsam mo //
translated: The remaining six drops are imagined to surround it.

original: de nas kham phor aa las ri rab tu bsams la /
analyzed: de nas kham phor aa las ri rab tu bsams la /
translated: Then, from aṃ, imagine a clay pot as Meru.

original: de'i steng du aa nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du aa nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs pa /
translated: On top of that, from aṃ itself, imagine a vajra-encircled maṇḍala of great power.

original: dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge h'um gi sa bon las byung ba mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge h'um gi sa bon las byung ba mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa rnam par bsams la /
translated: In the center, imagine a five-pronged vajra arisen from the seed syllable hūṃ, with three-pointed spears in the intermediate directions.

original: de bzhin du badzra ham bandha zhes brjod de /
analyzed: de bzhin du badzra ham bandha zhes brjod de /
translated: Recite vajra-haṃ-banda.

original: kham phor des ji skad du bshad pa'i theg le bdun dgab par bya'o //
analyzed: kham phor des ji skad du bshad pa'i theg le bdun dgab par bya'o //
translated: The bowl should be covered with the seven layers as explained.

original: de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du aom las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te /
analyzed: de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du aom las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te /
translated: Then, on the bowl and on top of Mount Meru, one should visualize the Blessed One Vairocana arisen from the syllable OṂ.

original: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g-yon brkyang bas ri rab mnan nas /
analyzed: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g-yon brkyang bas ri rab mnan nas /
translated: One should visualize Noble Acala pressing down on Mount Meru with his left foot in front of the Blessed One,

original: ral gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te /
analyzed: ral gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te /
translated: making a threatening gesture with his sword and noose to the winds.

original: de lta bus ni rlung rnams thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rlung rnams thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all the winds are bound.

original: de la chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog par bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the prevention of obstacles such as water should be explained.

original: ham las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g-yo bar bdag nyed @29b bskyad la /🔽grog mkhar gyis 'am /
analyzed: ham las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g-yo bar bdag nyed @29b bskyad la / grog mkhar gyis 'am /
translated: One should visualize oneself as Noble Acala standing on the wind and fire maṇḍalas arisen from the syllable HAṂ.

original: ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas /
analyzed: ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas /
translated: One should make an effigy of the obstacle with an anthill or cow dung that has not fallen on the ground.

original: kham las ral gri /
analyzed: kham las ral gri /
translated: From the syllable KHAṂ, one should generate a sword.

original: ram las me'i snying po bskyed la /
analyzed: ram las me'i snying po bskyed la /
translated: From the syllable RAṂ, one should generate the essence of fire.

original: kim las zhags pa dang / lcags kyu bskyed de /
analyzed: kim las zhags pa dang / lcags kyu bskyed de /
translated: Kim from the noose and the iron hook.

original: lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
translated: Holding it with the left hand,

original: lag pa g-yas pas lcags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pas lcags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas /
translated: with the right hand, with the iron hook and the noose,🔽having drawn it,

original: bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste /🔽g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la /
analyzed: bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste / g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la /
translated: one should place it in the effigy of the obstructor.🔽Standing in the position with the left leg extended,

original: rkang pa g-yon pas spyi bo nas btsir la /
analyzed: rkang pa g-yon pas spyi bo nas btsir la /
translated: pressing down with the left foot on the head,

original: 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: one should say this:

original: na ma: sa mantra badzr'a n'am /
analyzed: na ma: sa mantra badzr'a n'am /
translated: Namo samanta vajranām |

original: tsanda mah'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um /
analyzed: tsanda mah'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um /
translated: Canda mahā roshana sphutaya hūṃ |🔽Traka haṃ maṃ

original: tra ka ham mam zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o //
analyzed: tra ka ham mam zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o //
translated: Having said this, one should cut the effigy with the sword.

original: dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshva la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la me sa gdung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshva la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la me sa gdung bar bya'o //
translated: Having anointed the effigy with poison, black mustard seed, salt, and so forth, one should torment it with fire.

original: me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang //
analyzed: me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang //
translated: By being tormented with fire,

original: gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
analyzed: gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
translated: there is no doubt that it will be tormented.

original: tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang /
analyzed: tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang /
translated: Even if it is Brahmā or Indra,

original: de yi mod la myur du 'tshig / ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: de yi mod la myur du 'tshig / ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
translated: The Blessed One Vairocana has declared this.

original: las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las bya'o //
analyzed: las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las bya'o //
translated: These rites should be performed by one who has done the prior approximation of ten thousand recitations of the mantra of the Ārya Acalā yoga, and then one should perform the rites.

original: yang aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa /
analyzed: yang aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa /
translated: Again, with “Oṃ āḥ hūṃ,” one should visualize the Ārya Mañjuśrī Yamāntaka, black, with four faces,

original: phyag bzhi pa /
analyzed: phyag bzhi pa /
translated: four arms,

original: zhabs drug pa /🔽phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
analyzed: zhabs drug pa / phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
translated: and six legs.🔽In the two right hands he holds a sword and a battle-ax,

original: phyag g-yon gnyis na zhags pa gtun shing bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yon gnyis na zhags pa gtun shing bsnams pa /
translated: in the two left hands a noose and a pestle.

original: lho phyogs su gzigs pa /
analyzed: lho phyogs su gzigs pa /
translated: He gazes toward the south,

original: khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du gang bar mdzad pa rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du gang bar mdzad pa rnam par bsams la /
translated: and the entire realm of space is filled with hosts of wrathful ones.

original: mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Forming the spear-dart mudrā,

original: sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsam pas /
analyzed: sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsam pas /
translated: with the intention to ward off clouds and so forth,

original: tsham ngam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: tsham ngam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should apply it with a threatening gesture.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
translated: Having bound the vajra fist inside,

original: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdun thung gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdun thung gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: the union of the two index fingers is the mudra of the short a.

original: de ltar na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na /
analyzed: de ltar na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na /
translated: If in that way also the obstructors are not pacified,

original: kham phor som btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags @30a * //
analyzed: kham phor som btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags @30a * //
translated: one should write the mantra on two broken earthenware bowls with blood, charnel ground ash, poison, black mustard seed, and datura leaf juice.

original: bris la ; yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas /
analyzed: bris la ; yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas /
translated: Having enchanted white mustard seed one hundred and eight times,

original: kham phor kha sbyar te /
analyzed: kham phor kha sbyar te /
translated: one should join the two bowls together.

original: de'i nang du bzhag la /
analyzed: de'i nang du bzhag la /
translated: Having placed it inside,

original: me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la /
analyzed: me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la /
translated: one should imagine the obstructors of fire, etc.

original: sreg blugs brgya'am sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: sreg blugs brgya'am sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: One should offer one hundred oblations or seven oblations.

original: de nas de dag 'jig pa'am ;
analyzed: de nas de dag 'jig pa'am ;
translated: Then they will be destroyed,

original: 'chi ba'am / mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba'am / mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: or they will die, or they will be seized by a non-human being.

original: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyor bas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas la //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyor bas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas la //
translated: Or else, having recited the syllable hūṃ one hundred thousand times with the practice of Vajrahūṃkāra,

original: mi rus kyi rgyu las byas ba'i phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la /
analyzed: mi rus kyi rgyu las byas ba'i phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la /
translated: The kīla is made from a material of human bone, and is four finger-widths in size.

original: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
analyzed: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
translated: Recite it one hundred and eight times.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas /
translated: In the same way, summon, induct, and bind with the vajra hook and so forth.🔽Then, drive in the kīla into the effigy.

original: gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo de nas me'i tshe ba zhi bar bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo de nas me'i tshe ba zhi bar bshad par bya ste /
translated: Next, the pacification of the fire-offering is explained:

original: me'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: me'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: Above the fire, from vaṃ, is a water maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du padma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo /
analyzed: de'i steng du padma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo /
translated: In the center of a lotus upon that is a wheel.

original: de'i steng du bam gnyis nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kunda ltar dkar bar bzhugs te /
analyzed: de'i steng du bam gnyis nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kunda ltar dkar bar bzhugs te /
translated: Upon that, from two vaṃs, is Bhagavat Vairocana, white as a conch or the jasmine flower.

original: mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las /
analyzed: mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las /
translated: From the four great lakes, like Lake Anavatapta,

original: chu bo bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun babs pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: chu bo bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun babs pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: imagine that a stream of water falls like the four rivers, filling the ten directions.

original: rdo rje can dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor gyi ri rab dang / phur bu yang dag par bsrungs la /
analyzed: rdo rje can dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor gyi ri rab dang / phur bu yang dag par bsrungs la /
translated: Vajra and Vajra-Fierce-Blazing should guard the Mount Meru of the bowl, and the dagger should be well guarded.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed can dag gis /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed can dag gis /
translated: Vajra-Yaksha and Vajra-Terrifying should

original: de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la /
analyzed: de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la /
translated: bind the space of those.

original: rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o //
translated: The net should be made with the vajra binding.

original: yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog par bya'o //
translated: Or else, one should ward off the obstructors with the burnt offering of fierce action.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu h'um bzhis bton la /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu h'um bzhis bton la /
translated: Then, the dagger that is located in the center of the maṇḍala should be extracted with the four hūṃs.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la /
translated: The hole of the dagger should be filled with the five-colored powder that will be explained below.

original: mnyam por gzhag go //
analyzed: mnyam por gzhag go //
translated: It should be placed evenly.

original: de nas hi zhes bya bas mig g-yas pa dang / g-yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas hi zhes bya bas mig g-yas pa dang / g-yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
translated: Then, with the syllable hi, one should generate the sun and moon in the right and left eyes,

original: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la /
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la /
translated: and one should look all around with the gaze of wrath.

original: sgo rnams bya'o de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
analyzed: sgo rnams bya'o de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
translated: Then, one should consecrate the colors.

original: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas na /
analyzed: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas na /
translated: With the mantra Om vajra citra samaya hum, and with the seal, one should enchant all the colors seven times.

original: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
translated: Then, the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, said, They become the nature of vajra.

original: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
translated: The seal is as follows:

original: rdo rje'i @30b phyag rgya gnyis las ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i @30b phyag rgya gnyis las ni //
translated: From the two vajra seals,

original: mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba //
analyzed: mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba //
translated: The tips of the index fingers are joined.

original: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
analyzed: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
translated: Having made that, all the colors

original: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //🔽hi zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya // hi zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Are summoned with the blazing gaze.🔽With the mantra hi.🔽With the pledge seal of Vajrasūrya-krodha, and with the left vajra fist at the end,

original: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te /
analyzed: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te /
translated: One should enchant the colors with the mantra Om vajra citra samaya hum, and beginning from the northeast,

original: g-yas nas bskor bas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste /
analyzed: g-yas nas bskor bas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste /
translated: One should draw the lines with the left vajra fist, turning to the right.

original: phyis ci bder bya'o //
analyzed: phyis ci bder bya'o //
translated: One should do whatever is convenient later.

original: de'i mi pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i mi pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is the procedure:

original: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar ba'i rim pa 'dis ci bder dgye'o //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar ba'i rim pa 'dis ci bder dgye'o //
translated: One should draw the lines in whatever way is convenient, with the colors blue, yellow, red, green, and white.

original: khru drug par bya ba ni tshon rtsi'i ri mo chung tshad yin te /
analyzed: khru drug par bya ba ni tshon rtsi'i ri mo chung tshad yin te /
translated: The small measure of the line of colors is six cubits.

original: de phan chad khru bskyed pas rkang pa yang bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de phan chad khru bskyed pas rkang pa yang bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Beyond that, one should increase the cubits and also increase the legs.

original: de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
translated: Moreover, in the Vajra Peak Tantra,🔽the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, said:

original: sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
analyzed: sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
translated: Blue is the nature of the vajra peak,

original: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
analyzed: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
translated: the second is visualized as gold,

original: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
analyzed: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
translated: another has the nature of ruby,

original: de bzhin gzhan dag margad 'dra //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan dag margad 'dra //
translated: and another is like an emerald.

original: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
analyzed: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
translated: White should be known as inner,

original: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //🔽ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad // ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
translated: this is explained as the sequence of colors.

original: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
analyzed: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
translated: In the east, it is very blue,

original: lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa //🔽nub kyi phyogs ni dmar po ste //
analyzed: lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa // nub kyi phyogs ni dmar po ste //
translated: In the south, it is endowed with yellow,🔽In the west, it is red,

original: byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan //
analyzed: byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan //
translated: And in the north, it is endowed with green.

original: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni //
analyzed: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni //
